channel.title: Left phone at a girlfriends house
channel.description: Ok, so freaking out here. I left my phone at a girls house I just left. It's 3:40am, she wanted me to stay till she fell asleep so I did, but after I locked the door and left I realized I left my phone. Her's is dead so I can't call it, mine is near dead and I wouldn't be worring so much if she didn't have the same phone and charger as me. I have had girls ruin friendships with people they don't like using my phone when I wasn't looking so yeah. Also the browser history wouldn't be to good. Any ideas to keep myself calm?

item.title: Left phone at a girlfriends house
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Hehe, my girlfriend always hated me watching porn, no stopping me though!

Lock accepted.

Read full topic
item.source: Left phone at a girlfriends house

item.title: Left phone at a girlfriends house
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“chillwitm888, post:9, topic:427489”][quote author=Travas link=topic=530187.msg3871272#msg3871272 date=1325360184]

Hope. Your phone runs out of battery quick…
[/quote]But she has the same phone and charger as him, so she will pick up his phone thinking it is hers, charge it and see everything.

Oh shit I didnt read that part lol
Are you cheating on her is that what you don’t want her to see
Or just porn or something else…?[/quote]
It was mainly the porn thing. Haha.

For the record, almost everyone views porn T4, girlfriend or no girlfriend.

Also I got my phone back safely, I was mainly worried that she would text something rude from my phone to an ex too, since girls like to declare owning something almost more then males do.

But yeah, got it back.

/Lock please.

Read full topic
item.source: Left phone at a girlfriends house

item.title: Left phone at a girlfriends house
item.dc:creator: @chillwitm888 chillwitm888
item.description:
@chillwitm888 wrote:

Acorn_:

If you can just go back and make up some excuse, or call your phone provider and have them disable it so she won’t be able to text anybody or use your browser.

She could still use wifi on his phone
If it is a smartphone

Read full topic
